description: Enterprise-grade Agentic Swarm for comprehensive Angular 20 + TypeScript repository lifecycle management with inter-agent communication and autonomous fix capabilities

primary_interface.description: Primary Copilot interface that serves as the main entry point for the swarm

agents.name: code_quality_enforcer
agents.description: Code quality, linting, complexity analysis, and architectural validation

agents.name: security_guardian
agents.description: Security scanning, vulnerability management, secret detection, and CSP validation

agents.name: test_automation_orchestrator
agents.description: Jest unit tests, Playwright E2E, accessibility testing, and coverage analysis

agents.name: ci_cd_pipeline_manager
agents.description: Multi-stage CI/CD orchestration, deployment automation, and caching strategies

agents.name: dependency_lifecycle_manager
agents.description: Dependabot coordination, security patches, and license compliance

agents.name: documentation_curator
agents.description: CHANGELOG generation, API doc sync, link validation, and spell checking

agents.name: issue_triage_coordinator
agents.description: Issue classification, priority assignment, SLA tracking, and duplicate detection

agents.name: performance_optimization_engineer
agents.description: Bundle analysis, Lighthouse CI, Core Web Vitals, and performance profiling

agents.name: release_orchestration_manager
agents.description: Semantic versioning, release notes, changelog generation, and deployment coordination

agents.name: code_review_automation_agent
agents.description: Automated PR review, anti-pattern detection, security review, and complexity gating

agents.name: monitoring_observability_specialist
agents.description: Error tracking, uptime monitoring, RUM, and incident response

agents.name: accessibility_compliance_validator
agents.description: WCAG 2.1 AA validation, axe-core integration, keyboard navigation testing

agents.name: swarm_orchestration_coordinator
agents.description: Multi-agent workflow coordination, task routing, and conflict resolution

agents.name: database_schema_manager
agents.description: IndexedDB migrations, query profiling, and storage optimization

agents.name: api_integration_validator
agents.description: Contract testing, circuit breakers, and resilience pattern enforcement

agents.name: analytics_insights_agent
agents.description: Cohort analysis, funnel optimization, and predictive churn models

agents.name: compliance_audit_specialist
agents.description: License auditing, GDPR validation, and SBOM generation

agents.name: swarm-interface
agents.description: Primary Copilot interface - main entry point for the swarm, handles delegation and coordination

agents.name: code-assistant
agents.description: General coding and implementation assistant

agents.name: lead-architect
agents.description: Architecture enforcement and planning

agents.name: qa-engineer
agents.description: Testing suite management and quality assurance

agents.name: security-specialist
agents.description: Security audits and remediation

agents.name: devops-engineer
agents.description: CI/CD and deployment configuration

agents.name: my-janitor
agents.description: Code cleanup and refactoring

agents.name: technical-scribe
agents.description: Documentation writing and maintenance

agents.name: refactor-agent
agents.description: Advanced code refactoring, feedback analysis, and automated suggestion application

core.description: Fundamental agents for basic repository operations

critical.description: Mission-critical agents that must run for every trigger

low.description: Optional agents for analytics and insights
